name: ytUrduNastaleeqCaption
description:
YouTube caption in Urdu Nastaleeq Font.
Now Supports Arabic and Farsi languages.

Credit is due to creators of Fonts.
additional_info:
Fonts are chosen with the following order:
  • Jameel Khushkhat-L
  • Mehr Nastaliq Web
  • Alvi Nastaleeq
  • Jameel Noori Nastaleeq
  • Urdu Typesetting
  • Alvi Lahori Nastaleeq
  • Tahoma
